name: 4th International Conference on Public Health and Well-being
content: The knowledge and expertise contained within the discipline of Public Health are of great significance in mitigating the impacts of a global pandemic and are being revised and updated constantly in the current situation. Among different aspects of Public Health, Public Health Interventions have become widely deployed in shaping public behavior as a measure of minimizing the spread of the disease. Therefore Public Health 2022 expects to analyze and evaluate the competencies of Public Health Interventions in controlling the pandemic with the contribution of scholars and experts of this field.All potential individuals and enthusiasts are warmly invited to join this exclusive platform on 14th and 15th October that is aimed at building strong relationships that positively impact the process of restraining the pandemics and global health challenges.
